name: swaggerer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who behaves in an extremely confident way and thinks they are very important: He was never a swaggerer. See
swagger
More examplesFewer examplesNedda's lover on the side, Silvio, is a shy bespectacled anorak in a bobble hat rather than the usual preening swaggerer .Tony - chief swaggerer, babe magnet - is good at everything, including getting to school bright and early.
